entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
